translations: adj.旧时的；以前的，前……；（两者中）前者的
n.模子，模型；形成某事的人（或事）；线圈架，绕线模；（机翼、机身的）翼肋
【名】 （Former）（法）福尔梅，（德、捷）福尔默（人名）

phrs.translation: 成膜剂，成膜物；薄膜生成元素；薄膜形成器

sentences.sentence: The former option would be much more sensible.
sentences.translation: 前一种选择要明智得多。

sentences.sentence: Some former hostages contradicted the official version of events.
sentences.translation: 一些以前的人质反驳了官方对这些事件的说法。

sentences.sentence: He had renounced his former associates.
sentences.translation: 他已经宣布与过去的伙伴拆伙。
